title: Shamshir Ghar
description: Cave in Kandahar Province, Afghanistan, 3.5 miles NNE of Panjwai town, with archaeological remains from the Kushan period (100 BCE to 300 CE), Kushano-Sassanian (transition) period (300 to 700 CE), and the Early Islamic period (700 to 1222 CE).

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Shamshir Ghar after Dupree 1958.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Shamshir Ghar
